main.name: Satyam Bhardwaj
main.bio: Being a student of Electronics and Communication, I've deep interest in coding and Web Development. Learning new Tech is a hobby that I cheer a lot. Been developing websites for some time now. Don't have complete knowledge of everything, but that's how life is learning and adapting to new changes. Do visit some of my projects mentioned below.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: Designed one website from scratch and maintained the other website. Coordinated with content team to deliever best user experience. Designed an efficient UI and wrote a well readable code.

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Developed an online classes system for various schools in NCR Region. Tech stack used was Django, JavaScript, AWS. Coordinated with fellow team mates on regular basis.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.category: The look alike clone of Netflix. Do check

projects.title: Instagram Clone
projects.category: Just a look alike clone of Original Instagram

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
